TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DSACryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.DSA implements class System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
Public NotInheritable Class DSACryptoServiceProvider Inherits DSA Implements ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
public ref class DSACryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::DSA, System::Security::Cryptography::ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
type DSACryptoServiceProvider = class inherit DSA interface ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 定义访问 算法的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 实现的包装对象。

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 类创建数字签名并保护数据的完整性。You can use the class to create digital signatures and protect the integrity of your data. 若要使用公钥系统对消息进行数字签名，则发送方首先将哈希函数应用于消息，以创建消息摘要。To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 然后，发送方用发件人的私钥加密消息摘要，以创建发送方的个人签名。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 收到消息和签名后，接收方使用发送方的公钥解密签名，以恢复消息摘要，并使用发送方使用的相同哈希算法对消息进行哈希处理。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收方计算的消息摘要与发送方接收的消息摘要完全匹配，则接收方可以确保消息在传输过程中未被更改。If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can be sure that the message was not altered while in transit. 请注意，任何人都可以验证签名，因为发件人的公钥是常见的知识。Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. > [!NOTE] > 较新的非对称算法可用。Newer asymmetric algorithms are available. 请考虑使用 类，而不是 类。Consider using the class instead of the class. 使用 仅适用于与旧版应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. 此算法支持从512位到1024位的密钥长度（以64位为增量）。This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.

summary.span: 获取描述有关加密密钥对的附加信息的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

value.span: 描述有关加密密钥对的附加信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性检索有关加密密钥对的附加信息。Use the property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair. 返回的 对象描述密钥是否可导出，并指定密钥容器名称、有关提供程序的信息以及其他信息。The returned object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information. 在生成随机密钥的情况下，在调用使用密钥的方法之前，不会创建密钥容器。In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 如果尚未创建密钥容器， 属性返回的 对象的某些属性将引发 。Some properties of the object returned by the property will throw a if a key container has not been created. 若要确保已创建密钥容器，请在调用 属性之前调用方法，如 、、、等。To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as , , , , and so on, before you call the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在计算机的密钥存储而不是用户配置文件存储中保留密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the computer's key store instead of the user profile store.

value.span: 如果应在计算机密钥存储中保留密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key should be persisted in the computer key store; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 true 等效于将 标志传递到 对象。Setting this property to true is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 属性适用于当前应用程序域中的所有代码，而 对象仅适用于显式引用该对象的类。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, while the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 在未加载其用户配置文件的帐户下模拟或运行时，这些设置很有用。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded.

summary.span: 验证数字签名有效。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证 生成 数字签名。This method verifies the digital signature produced by . 如果 `null``str` 参数，则使用默认哈希算法（SHA1）。If the `str` parameter is `null`, the default hash algorithm (SHA1) is used. 有效的哈希算法是 。The valid hash algorithms is . 由于 SHA1 出现冲突问题，Microsoft 建议使用基于 SHA256 或更好的安全模型。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better.
